1.0.name: wordpress/dbd-pinterest-widget
1.0.description: The Designer by Design Pinterest widget is highly customisable, featuring the ability to specify a user account link, user account feed and number of items to display within the widget block. The widget works by parsing the Pinterest user feed to provide thumbnails and a short descriptions of each feed item. Cross-browser CSS and JavaScript is used to provide a thumbnail preview of each item within the widget.
